{
    "pattern": "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS t0; CREATE TABLE t0(c0 INT <constraint_type_parameter>); INSERT INTO t0 <dml_values_parameter>; SELECT c0 FROM t0 WHERE <where_parameter>; SHOW WARNINGS;",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<constraint_type_parameter>",
        "<dml_values_parameter>",
        "<where_parameter>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "SHOW WARNINGS, SELECT statement with EXP function",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The SHOW WARNINGS command does not return the expected warning message due to the absence of an actual warning generated by the preceding SELECT statement."
